group.label: International Packets and Boxable Packets
group.comment: Please note: Some of the Packets Tracked products require specific contractual agreements with PostNL. Please contact your PostNL account manager for more information about these products.

field.label: Use Packets International
field.comment: Packet Tracked is a small parcel with Track & Trace. Hand over your Packet Tracked items in a domestic mailbag with a Packet Tracked baglabel attached.
field.tooltip: This allows you the use of the priority parcel products. After you enable this setting the products can be selected in the default EPS and Globalpack selection.

field.label: Default Packet delivery
field.comment: Select the default product option for Packet shipments.

field.label: Use Boxable Packets
field.comment: Boxable Packets are used to ship small products. Please consult your PostNL account manager for more information about activating this service for your account.

field.label: Default Boxable Packet delivery
field.comment: Select the default product option for Boxable Packet shipments.

field.label: Calculation mode
field.comment: The PostNL extension automatically determines whether a shipment fits through a letterbox when calculation mode is set to Automatic. This can also be specified when creating shipments. When Calculation Mode is set to Automatic, PostNL will use Weight and Maximum Quantity for Letterbox Package to determine whether a shipment fits through the letterbox. This choice can be overridden when creating a shipment manually.
